meanings.definition: The quality or state of being waterproof.
meanings.sent1: The waterproofness of the raincoat kept me dry during the storm.
meanings.sent2: It is important to test the waterproofness of the tent before going camping.
meanings.sent3: The waterproofness of the umbrella saved the day when unexpected rain poured down.
meanings.sent4: Her trusty boots had such great waterproofness, they seemed to repel any water that came near.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofness of the swimming goggles made swimming in the pool a delightful experience.

meanings.definition: The ability to prevent water from passing through.
meanings.sent1: The waterproofness of the material kept the contents of the bag safe from the rain.
meanings.sent2: When choosing a raincoat, consider the waterproofness to stay dry in wet weather.
meanings.sent3: The waterproofness of the boat was so impressive, it seemed to glide effortlessly over the water.
meanings.sent4: The waterproofness of the roof was tested during the heavy downpour, and not a drop leaked through.
meanings.sent5: The waterproofness of the phone case allowed me to take photos underwater without any damage.
